name: Supernova Framework
body:
![Supernova Framework](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BAU_8kiCIAIihvt.jpg)
### About / Acerca de
>Supernova is a lightweight MVC PHP Framework wich can handle small and large projects. Based on VanillaPHP and CakePHP, with a database design based on Oracle. Our purpose is to allow the development of secure and stable webapps in a few line of codes

### Authors and Contributors
Authors: @ArkangelKruel @mrpuck

Contributors: @mauricioschneider

### Wiki and Issues
You can found the first steps in the [WIKI](https://github.com/ArkangelKruel/supernova-framework/wiki/First-steps). Feel free to submit new issues
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
